expo.name: Open Invite
expo.description: Open Invite is a social calendar for making plans with friendsâ€”discover events, RSVP, chat in circles, and keep everything organized in one place.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Open Invite uses the camera to capture photos inside the app before you publish them.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Open Invite accesses your photo library so you can move media between the app and your library.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Open Invite saves media you export from the app into your photo library.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Open Invite uses your location to show nearby content and services while you use the app.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Open Invite accesses your contacts to help you find people you already know inside the app.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Open Invite uses your calendar to help you save events you choose to attend.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsFullAccessUsageDescription: Open Invite needs full calendar access to create and manage events you choose to save.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsWriteOnlyUsageDescription: Open Invite needs calendar write access to add events you choose to save.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: Open Invite uses reminders to help you stay on track with events you choose to save.
infoPlist.NSRemindersFullAccessUsageDescription: Open Invite needs reminders access to help you stay on track with events you choose to save.
